ComicInfo.Summary: Deadpool brings Typhiod Mary to the Hellhouse, in order to help her get work so she can pay him for breaking her out of the crazy house. T-Ray is not pleased by this. This is because Typhiod and T-Ray have a past. This gives T-Ray another reason for T-Ray to hate old Deady so he burns off his mask. Deadpool freaks out and runs out of the Hellhouse screaming "my face!". He runs arounf frantically trying to find somethign to hide his face before someone sees it. He finds a young woman's laundry line and makes a make-shift mask from her clothes. The woman catches him with her clothes to his face and she assumes the worst. On accident during this occurrence Deadpool knocks Mary out the window and she has memories flooding back to her that were long forgotten while she was in the Asylum. And these memories will take them to New York City to visit an old buddy of hers...
ComicInfo.Title: Typhoid...It Ain't Just fer Cattle Any More or Head Trips or Head Jobs
